channel.title: MoparCraft FTB (Or other modded variations) - What do you think?
channel.description:
We're always looking for ways to improve the community, and how we expand. So today I bring forward an announcement to be discussed, and voted on by the community. We have operated a vanilla server for a number of years now and while I appreciate that a lot of the community, and potential traffic enjoy the vanilla aspect I also understand that vanilla only goes so far for a lot of people.
I have no intention of depriving what MoparCraft has always stood for, and implementing a completely new configuration. As I said previously: This map is permanent and the general vanilla aspect will always stay the same. I'm proposing an addition in the form of a separate gameserver entirely which will host a modded version of minecraft.
Specifically the more up-to-date FTB. I'd like the community to decide and logically put forward suggestions and links as to what should be hosted, and what shouldn't. Perhaps useful links too.

item.title: MoparCraft FTB (Or other modded variations) - What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Awesome, are you going with the MindCrack pack or FTB Ultimate?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft FTB (Or other modded variations) - What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

triston001:

we should add computercraft. i like using the computer for various things, expecially the ability to implement coding to have turtles do my bidding. we could also link up the computers and make a mini network and use that for various things, like leaving a message to somebody after they went offline.

computercraft is in a few of the packs including the mindcrack pack and also the mini network is called rednet and can be used for a ton of crap

Read full topic

item.description:

well its all in the launcher and to get the server files you just simply click to download the server files

also for more info on what mods are in the pack

Feed The Beast Wiki

MindCrack Pack

Note: This table is currently unfinished and may be missing important data. The MindCrack Pack is the pack used on the modded Minecraft server known as MindCrack. It currently features these mods: ExtrabiomesXL (MC Forum), BiblioCraft (MC Forum),...

item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

noobs are ftw:

how about we also vote on which modpack from the list on the ftb launcher if we do I vote on the mindcrack pack as it has alot of fun mods that should entertain every kind of user(besides pvpers)

Yeah, that’s what I was trying to get at by “providing links and specifics”. If you guys could mention which modpack that’d be great.
